channel.description: Recent content in Parenting on Nimke.nl

item.title: How to stay afloat asÂ parents
item.description: Multiple people have asked me how I feel being a parent. In the beginning, most of them expected an answer resembling “the best thing in my life”, or some other romanticised picture of parenthood. Even though I see parents like that around me, with the instant feeling of love and bliss in parenthood, for me it definitely wasn’t. Don’t get me wrong, I do love my children and wouldn’t trade them for the world, and I also didn’t experience any postnatal depression of sorts.
